petNameAdd:
1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Accused is present. Heard argument for both sides. later on, judgment delivered in the open court. The prosecution has failed to prove it&amp#039s case u/s 4 of POCSO Act against the accused beyond all reasonable doubt.The accused is, held, not guilty u/s 4 of POCSO Act. The accused is acquitted and set at liberty.Since the accused is in jail, so, he is allowed to go on bail of Rs. 15,000/- with a surety of like amount, i/d to remain in jail for 6 (six) months.
